product_name: Nathan Sport-Wash Laundry Detergent - 42 fl. oz.
long_description: Restore fabric performance and get the stink out of your activewear by using biodegradable Nathan Sport-Wash instead of regular laundry detergent. It gets the stink out without a trace of perfume.
short_description: Restore fabric performance and get the stink out of your activewear by using biodegradable Nathan Sport-Wash instead of regular laundry detergent. It gets the stink out without a trace of perfume.
